languages.text: On {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g}: if the target is suffering from {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g} and fails the corresponding {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with −25 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g}, it suffers an additional <u>(from 15 to 20)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}mental damage{/g}.
languages.original_text: При {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}попадании{/g}: если на цель действует {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}отравление{/g}, то при провале соответствующей проверки {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Выносливости{/g} на {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}сопротивление{/g} со {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}штрафом{/g} −25 цель получает <u>(от 15 до 20)</u> дополнительного {g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}психического урона{/g}.

traits.locale_text: On {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}hit{/g}: if the target is suffering from {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g} and fails the corresponding {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with −25 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g}, it suffers an additional 15-20 {g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}mental damage{/g}.

On {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g}: if the target is suffering from {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g} and fails the corresponding {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with −25 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g}, it suffers an additional <u>(from 15 to 20)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}mental damage{/g}.

On {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g}: if the target is suffering from {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g} and fails the corresponding {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with −25 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g}, it suffers an additional <u>(from 15 to 20)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}mental damage{/g}.

languages.text: При {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}попадании{/g}: если на цель действует {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}отравление{/g}, то при провале соответствующей проверки {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Выносливости{/g} на {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}сопротивление{/g} со {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}штрафом{/g} −25 цель получает <u>(от 15 до 20)</u> дополнительного {g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}психического урона{/g}.

traits.locale_text: При попадании: если цель находится под эффектом Токсина и провалила тест на Выносливость, она получает дополнительно 7-12 Ментального урона.

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}命中{/g}目标时，如果目标受到{g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}毒素{/g}影响，则需要进行{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}坚韧{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抗性检定{/g}，且在此次检定中承受-25{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}减值{/g}。如果目标未能通过检定，则会额外受到<u>15-20</u>点{g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}精神伤害{/g}。
languages.original_text: On {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g}: if the target is suffering from {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g} and fails the corresponding {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with −25 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g}, it suffers an additional <u>(from 15 to 20)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}mental damage{/g}.

traits.locale_text: {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}命中{/g}目标时，如果目标受到{g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}毒素{/g}影响，则需要进行{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}坚韧{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抗性检定{/g}，且在此次检定中承受-25{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}减值{/g}。如果目标未能通过检定，则会额外受到<u>15-20</u>点{g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}精神伤害{/g}。

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}命中{/g}時：ターゲットが{g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}毒素{/g}に苦しんでおり、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}耐久力{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抵抗テスト{/g}に25の{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}ペナルティ{/g}を受けて失格した場合、さらに<u>(15～20)</u>の{g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}精神的ダメージ{/g}を受ける。
languages.original_text: On {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g}: if the target is suffering from {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g} and fails the corresponding {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with −25 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g}, it suffers an additional <u>(from 15 to 20)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}mental damage{/g}.

traits.locale_text: {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}命中{/g}時：ターゲットが{g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}毒{/g}に苦しんでおり、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}耐久力{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抵抗テスト{/g}に25の{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}ペナルティ{/g}を受けて失格した場合、さらに15～20の{g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}精神的ダメージ{/g}を受ける。

languages.text: Al {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}impactar{/g}: si el objetivo sufre {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxina{/g} y falla una {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}prueba de fortaleza{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Resistencia{/g} con una {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalización{/g} de −25, sufre <u>(de 15 a 20)</u> de {g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}daño mental{/g} adicional.
languages.original_text: On {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g}: if the target is suffering from {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g} and fails the corresponding {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with −25 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g}, it suffers an additional <u>(from 15 to 20)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}mental damage{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Al {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}impactar{/g}: si el objetivo sufre {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxina{/g} y falla una {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}prueba de fortaleza{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Resistencia{/g} con una {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalización{/g} de -25, sufre 15-20 de {g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}daño mental{/g} adicional.

languages.text: Bei {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}Treffern{/g}: Sollte das Ziel unter {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}Gift{/g} leiden und bei der entsprechenden {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}Widerstandsprobe{/g} auf {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Zähigkeit{/g} mit einem {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}Abzug{/g} von −25 scheitern, erleidet es zusätzlich <u>(von 15 bis 20)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}Mentalschaden{/g}.
languages.original_text: On {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g}: if the target is suffering from {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g} and fails the corresponding {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with −25 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g}, it suffers an additional <u>(from 15 to 20)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}mental damage{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Bei {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}Treffern{/g}: Sollte das Ziel unter {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}Gift{/g} leiden und bei der entsprechenden {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Zähigkeit{/g}-{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}Widerstandsprobe{/g} mit einem {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}Abzug{/g} von −25 scheitern, erleidet es zusätzlich 15-20 {g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}Mentalschaden{/g}.

languages.text: Au moment où le {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}coup{/g} est porté : si la cible est frappée par l'effet {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}Toxine{/g} et qu'elle échoue à un {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}test de résistance{/g} d'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Endurance{/g} avec {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}pénalité{/g} de −25, elle subit <u>(de 15 à 20)</u> points de {g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}dégâts mentaux{/g} supplémentaires.
languages.original_text: On {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g}: if the target is suffering from {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g} and fails the corresponding {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with −25 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g}, it suffers an additional <u>(from 15 to 20)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}mental damage{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Au moment où le {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}coup{/g} est porté : si la cible est frappée par l'effet {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}Toxine{/g} et qu'elle échoue à un {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}test{/g} lié à la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Résistance{/g} avec {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}pénalité{/g} de -25, elle subit 15 à 20 points de {g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}dégâts mentaux{/g} supplémentaires.

languages.text: Hedef, {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}vuruş{/g} anında {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toksin{/g} etkisinden muzdaripse ve −25 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}ceza puanına{/g} sahip bir {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Dayanıklılık{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}direnç testinden{/g} geçemezse <u>(15 ila 20)</u> ilave {g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}zihinsel hasara{/g} maruz kalır.
languages.original_text: On {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g}: if the target is suffering from {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g} and fails the corresponding {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with −25 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g}, it suffers an additional <u>(from 15 to 20)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}mental damage{/g}.
